title: Get Nested Object Property From Path String
description: In this lab, we will explore how to retrieve nested object properties using a given path string in JavaScript. We will learn how to use various array methods such as map(), filter(), and reduce() to extract specific values from complex objects. This skill is essential for working with large datasets and APIs that return nested JSON objects.

meta.title: Retrieve Nested Object Properties with Path Strings
meta.description: Learn how to extract values from complex JSON objects using path strings in JavaScript.
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript practice, javascript practice online, object, path, javascript lab, nested, property, javascript tutor

steps.title: Get Nested Object Property From Path String

verify.name: Verify Node Command Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 从路径字符串获取嵌套对象属性
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将探索如何在JavaScript中使用给定的路径字符串来检索嵌套对象的属性。我们将学习如何使用各种数组方法，如map()、filter()和reduce()，从复杂对象中提取特定值。这项技能对于处理大型数据集和返回嵌套JSON对象的API至关重要。
